content.rendered:
Even though most people are interested in sports betting, it doesn’t mean that you should completely ignore all the other gambling components that could bring a plus in revenue. Sports betting affiliate programs come with a lot of surprises and 1xBet has a lot of interesting products to offer and it’s in your best interest to use all of them and transform those visitors into conversions. Don’t worry, we’re going to tell you everything about it.

Casino Games – Get More as a Betting Affiliate

As mentioned in the introduction, you don’t have to settle with just being sports betting affiliates. The interest in casino games is high and promoting both products of 1xBet is going to increase your chances of raising the conversion rates and making more money. Especially when promoting such a diverse casino like the one offered by 1xBet. Over 3000 slots from all the biggest software providers in the industry, hundreds of table games, bingo, keno, and poker are all yours to promote.

If your main goal is to promote the sportsbook product of 1xBet, you can still offer the casino as an alternative in between bets for players to win more and have fun until their match starts. You can also tell them that playing casino games is a lot simpler compared to sports betting since there’s no decision making, you just spin and have fun.

Live Casino – get the best deal from an affiliate program

It’s true that the Live Casino section is also about the casino, however, we decided to present it separately since it has an appeal of its own. The live dealer games offered by Evolution Gaming, Ezugi or NetEnt give players a special feeling. Opposed to the regular table games, being in the company of a beautiful live dealer can make the game even more exciting and make them feel as if they are in a real casino. Multiple versions of blackjack, roulette, and baccarat are available in the Live casino section and all these can be used to entice your visitors.

1xGames – promote Unique Games through our Affiliate Program

A good affiliate partner program is all about having plenty to choose from. And 1xBet covers that excellently with yet another product you can promote on your website. If the visitors to your website are not that interested in casino games, you can offer them something unique. The 1xGames section contains over 100 in-house developed games that are not available anywhere else on the internet. This gives our betting partners an excellent selling point you can use since everyone can offer lots of games nowadays so players are all about exclusivity. With the 1xGames you will give them exactly what they are looking for and that will positively influence your revenue.

Loto and Virtual Sports

The range of products you can offer through the 1xBet partners program does not end with the ones mentioned above. Being one of the best online affiliate programs out there, 1xBet enables you to offer to your visitors Loto and virtual sports as an alternative to sports betting or casino. Virtual sports are excellent for those that want to bet but there is not live event going on at the time while loto doesn’t need any presentation.

With so many alternatives, there’s no way you won’t take your business to the next level with what is one of the best affiliate marketing programs out there. If you’re not already our partner, become one right away and let’s find a way to make your business grow so that you make the most of it!
